shortDescription: Unrestricted file upload vulnerability in Yeager CMS 1.2.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by uploading a file with an executable extension.
vulnerabilityName: yeager yeager_cms Unrestricted Upload of File with Dangerous Type
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
